name: pivotal_extensions
description: Inspired by [Story Time](https://github.com/bertrandmoulard/story_time/tree/master), the purpose of this extension is to make tweaks to Pivotal Tracker's UI to enhance usability. The first piece of functionality is (like Story Time), to set a visual indicator of how long a card has been in progress; but several other features are planned.
author: Patrick Elam
